name: Epic 2: Creator Authentication
description: Signup, login, OAuth, session management. Required before any creator features.

userStories.title: Creator signup with email and password
userStories.description: As a new user, I want to create an account with email and password so I can start building my Handoff.
acceptanceCriteria: Signup form: email, password, confirm password
Email uniqueness check with clear error message
Form matches design system (inputs, buttons, error states)
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill

userStories.title: Creator login
userStories.description: As a returning user, I want to log in with my email and password so I can access my dashboard.
acceptanceCriteria: Invalid credentials show clear error message
On success: redirect to creator dashboard
'Forgot password' link (can be placeholder for v1)
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill

userStories.title: OAuth login (Google, Apple)
userStories.description: As a user, I want to sign up or log in with Google or Apple so I can get started without creating a password.
acceptanceCriteria: Google OAuth button on signup and login pages
Apple OAuth button on signup and login pages
New OAuth user creates account automatically
Returning OAuth user logs in seamlessly
OAuth accounts linked to same email merge correctly
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill

userStories.title: Creator dashboard shell
userStories.description: As a logged-in creator, I want to see my dashboard with my property, active trip status, and recent activity so I have a home base.
acceptanceCriteria: Dashboard shows: property summary card, active trip status (or 'Create your first trip' CTA), recent activity preview
Navigation to: My Property (edit manual), Trips, Settings
Empty state for new users with no property: 'Let's set up your home' CTA leading to wizard
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill
